message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with the opportunity to purchase this valuable product. Given its potential, I'm offering it to you at $1,400,000. I believe this price reflects its true worth and offers you a significant return on investment.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth to me.

Bob, I understand your perspective on the price.  After careful consideration, I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This is a very competitive offer considering the significant value this product holds.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I'm still a bit above $1,200,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1,250,000. This is the maximum I'm willing to pay for the product.
